name: Notes-hApp-Template
description: A React GraphQL Holochain hApp demonstrating how to use GraphQL with Holochain

scripts.hc:install: yarn install && cd ui_src && yarn install
scripts.hc:config: cd dna_src && hc test --testfile test/config-generate.js | tee conductor-output.txt && node test/config-copy.js
scripts.hc:start: npm run hc:config && npm run hc:run

author: Philip Beadle <philip.beadle@holo.host>
